title: Narcotics: the decision (D)
creator_credit: Robert W Larsen and United Research and Training Production
brief_description: Shows how a teenage girl seeking the adult world turns to cigarettes and liquor. She is then introduced to marijuana, tries heroin, and suddenly is surrounded by a network of smugglers and drug pedlars. Shows how drugs are injected and the excruciating pain addicts suffer when unable to get a “fix”. Please Note This film is not suitable for screening to children under fifteen. It is suggested the film be previewed for suitability to the proposed audience before screening. Warning: SOME SCENES MAY DISTURB.
